Headline: SLCG 2016 Grand Final
News Content: Happening for the 9th year, one of the grandest events in the Lankan eSports calendar, SLCG 2016 proudly brought to you by Gamer.LK. Alongside SLCG is the Colombo Comic Con '16, a massive celebration of Sri Lanka's geek culture.Photographer - Iraj Walisinghe | Chathuka Wijesinghe courtesy by 'LetMeKnow.lk'
